timeline.message: Added testcase for AxonServerEventScheduler. Updated javadoc.

timeline.author: smcvb

timeline.bodyText: You've potentially missed using the ShutdownLatch#registerActivity method. It's that method which makes it so that the latch will be waited upon during a shutdown.
timeline.author: smcvb

timeline.bodyText: Curious: we do not have to close the channels/stubs ourselves after usage?
timeline.author: smcvb

replies.bodyText: Channels are reused so no need to close them here. Stubs are just utility objects, they do not hold state.
replies.author: MGathier

timeline.bodyText: Framework's on JUnit 5, meaning all the use of public can be removed. Thus from the class, the setup, teardown and all test methods.
timeline.author: smcvb

timeline.bodyText: Nit: I'd personally prefer a private static inner class over an anonymous one.
timeline.author: smcvb
